Possibly the greatest online FPS game ever made. The mechanics and balance are perfect and the "just one more round" game play is more addictive than crack.  Every year I vow to stay away, every year I come back.  Not bad for a game that is close to a decade old.

Игра супер! Тот кто не любил версии старые тот и полюбит эту и даже CS:GO

Der gute alte Klassiker unter den competitive Multiplayerspielen. In diesem Spiel wirst du lernen was es heißt innerhalb von ms zu aimen. Nur wer es selbst gespielt gespielt hat wird erfahren was der Counter Strike Feeling ist und was es bedeutet in den Flow zu kommen. Meiner Meinung nach das beste Counter Strike von allen und auch allgemein mit einer der besten Shooter auf diesem Planeten!
First there was Source... Make your own story.

真的是很不错的一款游戏，画面精美，操作性强，应该是辉煌的延续了。
虽然起初时饱受争议，但金子总会发光的！

I have played this game since 2013. The community for the game is still strong and alive. Iceworld and crackhouse are some of the best community maps on this game. I mainly go on crackhouse 24/7 servers. But jailbreak and Surf servers are still a thing and you can find some people on those gamemodes.

For its time, it is a nice game, but there are newer Counter-Strike games out that are better. 

Got it for garrys mod.

なんでも出来てしまう神ゲー
その拡張性の良さに、何度Valveによる改悪アップデートが来ても不死鳥のように蘇ってくるゲームである
通常の対人だけでなく、bot撃ち・surf・bhop・xc（XtreamClimbだっけ？）・MG（ミニゲーム）・ZE（ゾンビエスケープ）・gg（GunGame)・Jailbreakなどなどあげたらきりがない程のゲームモードがある。
その気になればまったく異なるゲームのモードをそのまま移植できてしまうのではないだろうか？っという可能性を秘めてる気がする。
おすすめはZEである。和鯖でもZE鯖建ってるから遊びに来てね！（宣伝）

但しガチ対人に限ってはものすごく廃れている気がする。ガチ対人をしたいならGOへどうぞ

It was a great game and a worthy remake of CS1.6 imo. The only reason I don't recommend this is because the second remake Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is so much better in almost any aspect of the game you should get this one instead.

Great online shooting game. But at the time when you can choose between this and CSGO, make the leap to CSGO, it's better.

Counter-Strike: Source is a first-person shooter from Valve. This is the next generation of Counter-Strike running on the new Source Engine.

With same gameplay mechanic as the previous Counter-Strike, but with better engine. You get the old counter terrorist vs. terrorist gameplay in a round based match, buy weapons and equipments at the beginning of rounds and such with better experience with the new Source Engine.

Graphics of Counter-Strike: Source has been greatly improved as the game now use Source Engine. From the textures, models and effects are all improved. The game also now has ragdoll physics that apply to weapons and characters dead body. Each time you kill an enemy, their dead animation will vary and not scripted. And if a grenades explode near a dead body, that body may flown away somewhere. The maps has also been updated to the new engine and look so much better.

You'll definitely don't want to miss this one. I recommend this.

Rating 9/10

Да, друзья. Эта та самая CS:S. Я хочу сказать, что это отличная игра, с помощью которой можно скоротать время. Поиграть с друзьями, посмеяться. Я настоятельно рекомендую эту игру!

Counter Strike:Sourec is at first a little confusing when you first start playing(Esppecially since there are no offical servers), but once you get a hang of it, and play it with friends, it's awesome. The only problem with this game is the hit dedection. You can blast someone in the chest with a sniper rifle and do zero damage(not that you can't kill with a sniper, but it's hard).The way i get a lot of kills is be having your curos up to enemie heads(You can't aim with most weapons) and jump shot them if there close.

Definitely still alive. This is an awesome game, especially if you have someone to play with.

Take it seriously, play as a team, and be open to learning new tactics. The learning curve is steep but it's well worth it once you're there.

Игра «Counter-Strike: Source» сочетает в себе триумфальную командную слаженность «Counter-Strike» с передовой технологией Source™. Обладающий соответствующей последним достижениям технической мысли графикой, полностью обновленным звуком и реальной физикой, «Counter-Strike: Source» просто должен занять почетное место в коллекции каждого поклонника жанра «экшен».
